scripts.reset: orb delete k8s --force ${CLAUDECODE:+2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed' || true} && orb start k8s ${CLAUDECODE:+2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed' || true}
scripts.compile: helm template atk --output-dir dist --include-crds ${CLAUDECODE:+2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed' || true}
scripts.helm:secrets: op inject --force -i tools/values-orbstack.1p.yaml -o tools/values-orbstack.yaml ${CLAUDECODE:+2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed' || true}
scripts.helm:check-context: [ "$(kubectl config current-context)" = "orbstack" ] || (echo "Error: Not in orbstack context. Current context: $(kubectl config current-context)" && exit 1)
scripts.helm: bun run helm:secrets && helm upgrade --install atk ./atk -f ./tools/values-orbstack.yaml -n atk --create-namespace --timeout 15m ${CLAUDECODE:+--quiet 2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed|deployed' || true} ${CLAUDECODE:+|| --debug}
scripts.helm:connect: cd ../../ && bunx settlemint connect -a ${CLAUDECODE:+2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed|Connected' || true}
scripts.helm:subgraph: yq eval '.graph-node.graphNodeDefaults.env.SUBGRAPH = "kit:'$(cat ../subgraph/.generated/subgraph-hash.txt | tr -d '\n')'"' -i atk/charts/thegraph/values.yaml ${CLAUDECODE:+2>&1 | grep -E 'Error|Failed' || true}
